Format author string in APA style

Source: R/format_citation.R
format_apa_authors.Rd

Formats author names according to American Psychological Association (APA) style guidelines.

Usage

format_apa_authors(author_str)

Arguments

author_str

A character string containing author names in "Last, First" format, separated by " and ".

Value

A character string containing the authors formatted in APA style.

Details

APA author formatting rules:

  • Single author: unchanged

  • Two authors: "Last, F. M. & Last, F. M."

  • 3-7 authors: "Last, F. M., Last, F. M., ... & Last, F. M."

  • 8+ authors: First 6 authors, ellipsis, last author

See also

format_apa which uses this function to format citations.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
format_apa_authors("Smith, John and Johnson, Sarah")
format_apa_authors("Smith, John and Johnson, Sarah and Lee, David")
} # }
